languages.text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.
languages.original_text: Вольные Торговцы — это потомственные аристократы Империума, обладатели священного Торгового Патента, позволяющего им исследовать неизведанные миры за пределами Империума. Они сами вольны решать как им поступать с инопланетными цивилизациями, древними технологиями, новыми планетами или обитателями давно утерянных человеческих миров. В первую очередь, они сами владыки своей судьбы.

traits.locale_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary Imperial nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond Imperial control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

Rogue Traders are hereditary Imperial nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond Imperial control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

languages.text: Вольные Торговцы — это потомственные аристократы Империума, обладатели священного Торгового Патента, позволяющего им исследовать неизведанные миры за пределами Империума. Они сами вольны решать как им поступать с инопланетными цивилизациями, древними технологиями, новыми планетами или обитателями давно утерянных человеческих миров. В первую очередь, они сами владыки своей судьбы.

Freihändler sind erbliche imperiale Adlige und Träger eines heiligen Handelsbriefs, der sie ermächtigt, die Welten der Galaxie zu durchstreifen, die außerhalb der imperialen Kontrolle oder des Wissens liegen. Sie können frei entscheiden, wie sie auf fremde Kulturen, uralte Technologien, neue Planeten oder Welten, die längst vergessene menschliche Zivilisationen beherbergen, reagieren, und sind in erster Linie für ihr eigenes Schicksal verantwortlich.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

traits.locale_text: Freihändler sind erbliche imperiale Adlige und Träger eines heiligen Handelsbriefs, der sie dazu ermächtigt, die Welten der Galaxie zu durchstreifen, die außerhalb der imperialen Kontrolle oder des Wissens liegen. Sie können frei entscheiden, wie sie auf fremde Kulturen, uralte Technologien, neue Planeten oder Welten, die längst vergessene menschliche Zivilisationen beherbergen, reagieren, und sind in erster Linie Herr ihres eigenen Schicksals.

languages.text: Les libres-marchands sont des nobles héréditaires, détenteurs d'une lettre de marque sacrée qui leur permet de parcourir les mondes de la galaxie échappant au contrôle ou à la connaissance de l'Imperium. Ils sont libres de décider comment réagir face aux cultures xénos, aux technologies antiques, aux nouvelles planètes ou aux mondes abritant des civilisations humaines tombées dans l'oubli, et sont surtout maîtres de leur destin.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

traits.locale_text: Les Libres-Marchands sont des nobles impériaux héréditaires, détenteurs d'une Lettre de Marque sacrée qui leur permet de parcourir les mondes de la galaxie qui échappent au contrôle ou à la connaissance de l'Empire. Ils sont libres de décider comment réagir face aux cultures xénos, aux technologies anciennes, aux nouvelles planètes ou aux mondes abritant des civilisations humaines tombées dans l'oubli, et sont surtout maîtres de leur destin.

languages.text: 行商浪人是世袭的贵族。他们持有神圣的贸易授状，有权在帝国疆土之外的银河系世界四处漫游。他们可以自由决定如何应对外星文化、古老技术、新行星，或是早已被人遗忘的人类文明世界。行商浪人拥有选择的权利，可以将自己的命运牢牢掌握在手中。
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人是世袭的贵族。他们持有神圣的贸易授状，有权在帝国疆土之外的银河系世界四处漫游。他们可以自由决定如何应对外星文化、古老技术、新行星，或是早已被人遗忘的人类文明世界。行商浪人拥有选择的权利，可以将自己的命运牢牢掌握在手中。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は世襲貴族であり、帝国の支配や知識の及ばない銀河系の惑星を放浪する権限を与えられた神聖な通商許可証の保持者である。彼らは異星人の文化、古代のテクノロジー、新しい惑星、あるいははるか昔に忘れ去られた人類の文明が存在する惑星に対してどのように対応するかを自由に決めることができ、何よりもまず自身の運命の支配者である。
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は帝国の世襲貴族であり、帝国の支配や知識の及ばない銀河系の惑星を放浪する権限を与えられた神聖な通商保証書の保持者である。彼らは異星人の文化、古代のテクノロジー、新しい惑星、あるいははるか昔に忘れ去られた人類の文明が存在する惑星に対してどのように対応するかを自由に決めることができ、何よりもまず自身の運命の支配者である。

languages.text: Los Comerciantes Independientes son nobles por vía hereditaria. Portan una Patente de Comercio sagrada que les confiere la potestad de errar por aquellos mundos de la galaxia que se escapan al control o conocimiento del Imperium. Tienen la libertad de acción ante culturas alienígenas, tecnologías antiguas, planetas nuevos o mundos que alberguen civilizaciones humanas olvidadas tiempo ha. Ante todo, son los dueños absolutos de su propio destino.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.

traits.locale_text: Los Comerciantes Independientes son nobles del Imperium por vía hereditaria. Portan una Patente de Comercio sagrada que les confiere la potestad de errar por aquellos mundos de la galaxia que se escapan al control o conocimiento del Imperium. Tienen la libertad de acción ante culturas alienígenas, tecnologías antiguas, planetas nuevos o mundos que alberguen civilizaciones humanas olvidadas tiempo ha. Ante todo, son los dueños absolutos de su propio destino.

languages.text: Hür Tacirler, haklarını miras yoluyla kazanan ve kutsal Ticari Ruhsatnamelerin hamilleri olan asilzadelerdir. Bu ruhsatname onlara İmparatorluk'un hâkimiyetinin ve bilgisinin dışında kalan galaksilerdeki dünyalara seyahat etme yetkisi kazandırır. Yabancı kültürlerle, kadim teknolojilerle, yeni gezegenlerle veya çoktan unutulmuş insan medeniyetleri barındıran dünyalarla karşılaştıklarında ne yapacaklarına karar vermekte özgürdürler ve her şeyden öte de kendi kaderlerinin efendisidirler.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders are hereditary nobles, the bearers of a sacred Warrant of Trade that empowers them to roam those worlds of the galaxy that lie beyond the Imperium's control or knowledge. They are free to decide how to react to alien cultures, ancient technologies, new planets, or worlds harbouring long-forgotten human civilisations, and are first and foremost masters of their own fates.
